ComicInfo.Title: Vol. 3
ComicInfo.Tags: Shazam,Detective Chimp,Nightmaster [Jim Rook],Spectre,Captain Marvel [Billy Batson],Phantom Stranger,Nightshade [Eve Eden],Ragman [Rory Regan],Eclipso [Jean Loring],Enchantress [June Moon?],Black Alice,Blue Devil [Dan Cassidy]
ComicInfo.Summary: Koumori leads Karasu and Shirasagi through the wastes of Purgatory, while high above, the Seraphim argue over how best to prevent the Distortion from spreading any further. When the war between Heaven and Hell begins once again, Dominions and Karasu restart their own fight, but soon the Archduke gets involved, and what happens in the end will take everyone by surprise! Faith, passion and betrayal collide as the universe spirals downward towards chaos... But are the feelings of two star-crossed lovers enough to set things right?
